dt: {d_link|union territory|union territory} of southeastern India that is surrounded by the state of Tamil Nadu and that was a settlement of French India before 1954, {it}area{/it} 183 square miles (474 square kilometers), {it}population{/it} 973,829
city and port on the Bay of Bengal in southeastern India that is the capital of the union territory of Puducherry {it}population{/it} 220,749

shortdef: union territory of southeastern India that is surrounded by the state of Tamil Nadu and that was a settlement of French India before 1954, area 183 square miles (474 square kilometers), population 973,829
city and port on the Bay of Bengal in southeastern India that is the capital of the union territory of Puducherry population 220,749
